page.name: Miasma
page.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. This poisonous staff was a gift from the Shadow of the Wind ninja clan for saving their village from Honda, the Iron-Fisted Giant.

properties.name: Miasma
properties.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. This poisonous staff was a gift from the Shadow of the Wind ninja clan for saving their village from Honda, the Iron-Fisted Giant.

page.name: Honda's Accord
page.description: Thyton, jonin of the Shadow of the Wind ninja clan has asked you to save his village! Honda, the Iron-Fisted Giant has been turned from the town's guardian into the town's destroyer!

properties.name: Honda's Accord
properties.description: Thyton, jonin of the Shadow of the Wind ninja clan has asked you to save his village! Honda, the Iron-Fisted Giant has been turned from the town's guardian into the town's destroyer!
properties.complete: The Shadow of the Wind Village has been saved! You and your dragon were more than a match for the Iron-Fisted Giant! You have saved the village twice in one day... that's gotta be a record!
